analysis_summary: Located full-year (FY25) exceptional cost figures in column AE.  Mapped the aggregated “Total Exceptional Costs” (cell AE11) and the specific line “IT Consultancy” (cell AE12) to the Chart-of-Accounts category OTHER_EXP, as these represent non-recurring cost items best classified as Other Expenses.  Values were recorded in thousands of pounds (£k) and rounded to whole-number integers to comply with the required schema.
